output.dependency: The title of the movie (column 1) may be dependent on the release year of the movie (column 2), as the title can give insight into the context and events portrayed within the timeline of the film.
The release date of the movie (column 3) can be dependent on the country of release (column 9), suggesting that the date mentioned is specific to the USA.
The language of the movie (column 8) might indicate a dependency on the synopsis provided (column 16), as the synopsis will reflect cultural aspects and context influenced by the language.
The director of the movie (column 4) is likely to have a dependency on the writers of the movie (column 5), as directors often work closely with the screenwriters to bring a script to life.
The cast of actors in the movie (column 6) can be dependent on the complete list of performers (column 7), where the full cast is comprised of the featured actors and supporting roles listed.
The genre of the movie (column 14) may correlate with the location description (column 15), as certain filming locations may be associated with specific genres in the movie industry.
